column4: Anyone: Is there a fix for the sound in Intrepid Ibex yet? I've looked on the internet and some say it's  an out-of-date Alsamixer. Is this true?
this place doesnt hand hold you
I had the same problem and it had to do with me having 2 sound cards. my onboard and a audigy2 board
what I had to end up doing, was set in System -> Prefs -> Sound was 'OSS Sound System' to get my flash to work
Okay, I'll try
Which one do I set to OSS Sound System?
the top 2, especially the Movies/Music selection
oh ok
Yes, I've had it on my system
I had a bugger of a time getting it the sound to work but I finally got it to work
Okay, I took your guys recommendations, let me test
Changing the top 2 settings in sound to Open Sound System didn't help
did you make sure firefox was dead?
Yes, I restarted firefox
Although, there are about 4 different types of OSS in my sound preferences
Ok. I think this is beyond me man. I got it to work but I had to do alot to get it
Okay, I'll keep messing with it. That's what my brother always told me to do in Linux, lol
yeah I wish that it came pre-loaded and ready to go as a far as flash I think that is what keeps alot of users from making the 'switch'
Haha, unforunately I still have to a bit since I need CAD programs that only work on windows
you cant run CAD in VirtualBox?
what's virtual box?
Thank you, I'll look into that
Hey it's me again
